alanMistakes: Alan ashobora gukosa. Koresha ubushishozi bw’ubuvuzi.
name: Izina
eyeMarqueeLine2: Nigute nabona optic disc nkoresheje Arclight?
eyeMarqueeLine3: Umugabo 25, ijisho ritukura iminsi 3, atinya urumuri, kureba kwagabanutse gato
eyeMarqueeLine6: Umugore 65, kubona bike, nta magalasi; imbere y’ijisho ni nziza, lens yarijimye
eyeMarqueeLine7: Umubyeyi ahangayitse: umwana afite pupil yera, nta kureba mu jisho
earMarqueeLine2: Nshobora kubona tympanic membrane nkoresheje Arclight?
earMarqueeLine3: Umusore 16, ububabare kuri pinna iminsi 2, irimo kuribwa, kumva biracyari byiza
earMarqueeLine6: Umugabo 73, kumva byaragabanutse. Canal ntiyagaragara neza, mbona cerumen gusa
geoInfoText: Iyo ukande kuri "Kumenya aho uri" haroherezwa latitude/longitude nyakuri bigafasha inama nziza.
frontOfEyeText:
Geranya amaso: ahagarariye, iburyo, ibumoso, hejuru, hasi
Yegera uhagarare neza. Suzuma: ibipfukisho by’amaso, conjunctiva, cornea, pupil
Koresha fluoro gupima ulcer cyangwa scratch ya cornea
fundalReflexText:
Icyumba gicyezuka, umwana yituje; intera y’ukuboko—gereranya reflex
Bisa: urumuri, ibara, shape
Yegera urebe: ikimeyetso, cataract, RB, Vit Haem
backOfEyeText:
Koresha ijisho ry’ukuboko ureba irya pasiyanti; rimwe ku rindi
Pasiyanti arebe imbere atareba urumuri; yegera ushake optic disc (dilate = kureba neza)
Suzuma disc: imipaka, ibara, cup. Kurikirana imiyoboro minini hanyuma umusabe kureba ku rumuri ubone macula
additionalText_eye:
Menya discs: zisanzwe, zatoboye, imiyoboro mishya, zicupye, zafota
>Imenyere kenshi<
allAroundEarText:
Reba: pinna, tragus, mastoid niba hari kubyimba, ububabare cyangwa amazi
Hindura pinna gahoro, wumve niba hari ububabare
earCanalText:
Tundika umutwe, fata Arclight nk’ikaramu
Dhonsa pinna hejuru/inyuma (abakuze) cyangwa hasi/inyuma (abana)
Shyiramo speculum (abakuze 4.5 mm, abana 2.5 mm), shimura umusatsi, jombora niba bikenewe
Shakisha: wax, inyanda, infection
tympanicMembraneText:
Menya handle ya malleus, reflex y’urumuri n’attic
Reba: ibara, umwanya, ukugaragara
Imenyesha dodo, amazi cyangwa inkovu
generalObservationText:
Reba uduhumbi, impinduka z’ibara n’uko dusakaye
Korakora buhoro umenye texture, ubushyuhe cyangwa ububabare
uvLightText:
Mu mwijima, reba fluorescence:
tinea (ubururu-icyatsi), pityriasis versicolor (oranje-mkuwa), erythrasma (coral-umutuku), vitiligo (ubururu-weru), acne (umutuku-oranje), nits (ubururu bworoheje)
dermoscopyText:
Fata polariser ya Arclight nk’ikaramu, reba: ABCDE (Asymmetry, Border, Colour, Diameter > 6 mm, Evolving)
Suzuma: PDSBV (pigment network, dots, streaks, blue-white, vascular)
additionalText_skin:
Menya lesion: isanzwe, ishobora kubi, yabyimbye
>Imenyere kenshi<
aboutAlanText:
Alan ni umufasha wa AI mu ipimwa ry’amaso, amatwi n’uruhu. Akomatanya model y’ururimi n’imitekerereze ya symbol. Azi icyo akora, akomeye, agezweho.

Ubumenyi bw’ubuvuzi, ubw’akarere n’amafoto bihuzwa n’inshingano z’abakozi b’ubuzima n’abaganga. Ikiganiro kigufi gitanga isuzuma n’imicungire; gukoresha Arclight biri hose.
instructionsIntro: Alan ni igikoresho cyo kwiga gishingiye kuri AI kigenewe abanyeshuri n’abandi babona rimwe na rimwe gusa indwara z’amaso, amatwi cyangwa uruhu. Andika neza kandi wirinde kuvuga amazina cyangwa ibisobanuro biranga umuntu. Reba neza umutwe/igisura/igice cy’umubiri kibangamiwe kandi ugenzure amaso/amatwi byombi. Murakagira amahirwe!
instructionsUseArclight_default: Koresha Arclight: imbere, fundal reflex, inyuma y’ijisho.
instructionsJustRight_eye: Umugabo 25, ijisho ritukura iminsi 3. Nta miti cyangwa kibazo cyamasezerano. Kubabara, amarira, akantu k’umweru kuri cornea. Amapupil asanzwe, kureba 6/12; irindi 6/6.
instructionsTooMuch_eye: Umugabo aje uyu munsi ijisho ritukura, yibwira ko ibyo yariye byabyigizemo. Ndabona amarira n’imipaka itukura. Arifuza ubufasha—aratinya ko cornea yangiritse. Ati ‘Iki ni iki?’
instructionsAdditionalQuery_eye: Alan anasubiza ibibazo by’amasomo: Iritis ni iki? Nigute nabona retina?
instructionsJustRight_ear: Umugabo 25, ugutwi gutukura iminsi 3. Nta miti cyangwa ikibazo cyabanje. Kubabara, amazi ava. Drum itukura, kumva byagabanutse mu gutwi kurwaye, bisanzwe mu kundi.
instructionsTooMuch_ear: Umugabo aje n’ugutwi gutukura, avuga ko byatewe n’ibyo yariye. Ndabona amazi n’imipaka itukura. Arabara kumva no kubabara; ati ‘Iki ni iki?’
instructionsAdditionalQuery_ear: Alan anasubiza n’iby’amasomo y’amatwi: Otitis media ni iki? Nigute nasukura amatwi?
instructionsJustRight_skin: Umugabo 25, agace gatukura ku ruhu iminsi 3. Nta miti cyangwa kibazo cyabanje. Ruribwa, rurarya.
instructionsTooMuch_skin: Umugabo aje uruhu rutukura, yibwira ko ibyo yariye byabitumye. Ndabona amarira n’imipaka itukura. Arabangamiwe na pigment no kwangirika; ati ‘Iki ni iki?’
instructionsAdditionalQuery_skin: Alan anasubiza n’ibibazo by’uruhu: Eczema ni iki? Nigute nabona pigment network?
instructionText: Alan ni igikoresho cyo kwiga gishingiye kuri AI kigenewe abanyeshuri n’abandi babona rimwe na rimwe gusa indwara z’amaso, amatwi cyangwa uruhu. Andika neza kandi wirinde kuvuga amazina cyangwa ibisobanuro biranga umuntu.
